about_the_game:
Ren Xia is an instant action role-playing game in which you play the role of a young warrior of unknown origin who travels around the ancient land of China, seeking martial arts masters to fight with each other, and gradually unravel the mystery of his own origin.

This is a very difficult game, you need to make the right moves at the right time to defuse the enemy's various offensives, and constantly counterattack. Dance on the edge of a knife.

At the same time, you will accumulate energy with the action. Rational use of these energies to strengthen their own actions, change the situation of the war. In the case of enough energy, it can play a continuous offensive and defeat a strong enemy.

Game background


It all started with the fall of Loulan.

A small pearl country in a desolate desert, destroyed in a single night.

Countless masters were killed, and the pattern of martial arts was rewritten.

Twenty years later, the chaos has just subsided,

And the children born in those turbulent years have grown into men.

Now, he will go to find the seven lost Swords and uncover the truth of the story.

Game Features


Martial arts story experience with Chinese characteristics!

Exciting and difficult action battles!

A variety of weapons attack and defense collision!

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages: Violence or Gore

short_description: Ren Xia is a ARPG game in which you play as a young knight who competes in a martial arts tournament in an ancient oriental country and makes unremitting efforts to win the first place in the world.
